user.title: Connect to CloudStash
user.description: Enter the connection details for your object storage. CloudStash works with any provider that offers an S3-compatible API.

data_description.access_key_id: The access key provided by your storage service.
data_description.secret_access_key: The secret that belongs to the access key above.
data_description.bucket: Name of an existing bucket. CloudStash will not create one for you.
data_description.endpoint_url: Full URL to the S3-compatible API of your provider, e.g. https://s3.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com.
data_description.region: Region identifier, e.g. eu-central-1. Check your provider's documentation if unsure.
data_description.prefix: Folder prefix inside the bucket. Backups end up under {prefix}/backups/. Leave at the default unless you have a reason to change it.

reauth_confirm.title: Update CloudStash credentials
reauth_confirm.description: The stored credentials for bucket {bucket} are no longer accepted. Please enter valid credentials.

data_description.access_key_id: Your new or updated access key.

reconfigure.title: Edit CloudStash settings
reconfigure.description: Adjust any of the connection parameters below. The connection will be verified before saving.

data_description.access_key_id: The access key provided by your storage service.
data_description.secret_access_key: The secret that belongs to the access key above.
data_description.bucket: Name of an existing bucket. CloudStash will not create one for you.
data_description.endpoint_url: Full URL to the S3-compatible API of your provider.
data_description.prefix: Folder prefix inside the bucket. Backups end up under {prefix}/backups/.

error.cannot_connect: Could not reach the storage endpoint. Verify the URL and make sure the host is reachable from this network.
error.invalid_bucket_name: The bucket name is not valid. Names must be lowercase, 3-63 characters, using only letters, digits and hyphens.
error.invalid_credentials: Access denied. The provided key pair does not have permission to access this bucket.
error.invalid_endpoint_url: The endpoint URL is malformed. It must start with http:// or https://.

abort.already_configured: A CloudStash entry for this bucket and endpoint already exists.

cannot_connect.message: CloudStash cannot reach the storage endpoint.

invalid_bucket_name.message: The bucket name is not valid.

invalid_credentials.message: Access denied for the configured bucket.
